member.name: T:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction
member.summary: Actions that can be performed during VT parsing.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.None
member.summary: No action.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Clear
member.summary: Clear all parameters, intermediate characters, and the ignore flag.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Collect
member.summary: Collect an intermediate character.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.CsiDispatch
member.summary: Dispatch a CSI (Control Sequence Introducer) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.EscDispatch
member.summary: Dispatch an ESC (Escape) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Execute
member.summary: Execute a C0 or C1 control function.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Hook
member.summary: Start of a DCS (Device Control String) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Ignore
member.summary: Ignore the current byte.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.OscEnd
member.summary: End of an OSC (Operating System Command) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.OscPut
member.summary: Pass a character within an OSC sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.OscStart
member.summary: Start of an OSC (Operating System Command) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Param
member.summary: Process a parameter character (digit or semicolon).

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Print
member.summary: Print a character or Unicode codepoint to the screen.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Put
member.summary: Pass a character within a DCS sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Unhook
member.summary: End of a DCS (Device Control String) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseAction.Error
member.summary: An error occurred during parsing.

member.name: T:VTParseSharp.VTParseCallback
member.summary: Callback delegate for VT parse events.
member.param: The parser instance that triggered the event.
The character or Unicode codepoint associated with the action (0 if none).

member.name: T:VTParseSharp.VTParser
member.summary: VT terminal escape sequence parser implementing Paul Williams' DEC compatible state machine. See: http://www.vt100.net/emu/dec_ansi_parser

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParser.MaxIntermediateChars
member.summary: Maximum number of intermediate characters that can be collected.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParser.MaxParams
member.summary: Maximum number of parameters that can be collected.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.UserData
member.summary: Gets or sets user-defined data associated with this parser instance.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.State
member.summary: Gets the current state of the parser.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.IntermediateChars
member.summary: Gets the intermediate characters collected during parsing.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.NumIntermediateChars
member.summary: Gets the number of intermediate characters collected.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.Parameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters collected during parsing.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.NumParams
member.summary: Gets the number of parameters collected.

member.name: P:VTParseSharp.VTParser.IgnoreFlagged
member.summary: Gets whether the ignore flag has been set (too many intermediate chars).

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.#ctor(VTParseSharp.VTParseCallback)
member.summary: Creates a new VT parser with the specified callback.
member.param: The callback to invoke for parse events.

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.Reset
member.summary: Resets the parser to its initial state.

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.Parse(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Parses the specified data buffer.

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.Parse(System.Byte)
member.summary: Parses a single byte.

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.GetActionName(VTParseSharp.VTParseAction)
member.summary: Gets the name of an action for debugging purposes.

member.name: M:VTParseSharp.VTParser.GetStateName(VTParseSharp.VTParseState)
member.summary: Gets the name of a state for debugging purposes.

member.name: T:VTParseSharp.VTParseState
member.summary: States of the VT parser state machine.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.None
member.summary: No state (used as a sentinel value).

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.CsiEntry
member.summary: Entry point for a CSI (Control Sequence Introducer) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.CsiIgnore
member.summary: Ignoring a malformed CSI sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.CsiIntermediate
member.summary: Collecting intermediate characters within a CSI sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.CsiParam
member.summary: Collecting parameters within a CSI sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.DcsEntry
member.summary: Entry point for a DCS (Device Control String) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.DcsIgnore
member.summary: Ignoring a malformed DCS sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.DcsIntermediate
member.summary: Collecting intermediate characters within a DCS sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.DcsParam
member.summary: Collecting parameters within a DCS sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.DcsPassthrough
member.summary: Passthrough mode within a DCS sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.Escape
member.summary: Processing an ESC (Escape) sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.EscapeIntermediate
member.summary: Collecting intermediate characters within an ESC sequence.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.Ground
member.summary: Ground state; normal character processing.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.OscString
member.summary: Processing an OSC (Operating System Command) string.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseState.SosPmApcString
member.summary: Processing a SOS, PM, or APC string.

member.name: T:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable
member.summary: Contains the state transition tables for the VT parser. Generated from Paul Williams' DEC compatible state machine specification.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable.ActionNames
member.summary: Action names for debugging/display purposes.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable.StateNames
member.summary: State names for debugging/display purposes.

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable.EntryActions
member.summary: Entry actions for each state. Indexed by (state - 1).

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable.ExitActions
member.summary: Exit actions for each state. Indexed by (state - 1).

member.name: F:VTParseSharp.VTParseTable.StateTable
member.summary: The main state transition table. Indexed by [state-1][character]. Each byte encodes: lower nibble = action, upper nibble = new state.
